channel.title: Boardroom on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Boardroom on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Boardroom Plans Print Magazine Launch as Kevin Durant-Backed Start Up Branches Out
item.description: The company run by Rich Kleiman is testing the waters with a U.S. Open-themed cover feature in August and plans to publish quarterly beginning in 2026.
